reports.query: MATCH (v:VERSION) RETURN v.version as Version, v.updates as Updates

reports.title: Detailed Graph
reports.query: MATCH (f:FHIR)-[s]->(t:FHIR_DATA_TYPE)-[r]->(p:FHIR_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY) RETURN f,s,t,r,p

reports.title: Date Types in the System
reports.query: MATCH (t:FHIR_DATA_TYPE) RETURN t.name as Name

reports.title: Top Level
reports.query: MATCH (n:CANONICAL_MODEL)-[r]->(m:CANONICAL_NODE) RETURN n,m,r

reports.title: Detailed Graph
reports.query:
MATCH (n:CANONICAL_MODEL)-[r:HAS_SUB_MODEL|CONSISTS_OF*1..]->(m:CANONICAL_NODE)
with n,r,m
OPTIONAL MATCH (m)-[t:HAS_DATA_TYPE]->(o:CANONICAL_DATA_TYPE) 
RETURN n,m,o,r,t

reports.title: Data Types In System
reports.query: MATCH (n:CANONICAL_MODEL)-[r:HAS_SUB_MODEL]->(m:CANONICAL_NODE)-[s:CONSISTS_OF*1..]->(p:CANONICAL_NODE)-[t]->(d:CANONICAL_DATA_TYPE) RETURN m.name as Model, p.name as Name, d.data_type as Datatype

reports.title: Example Canonical Definition - Observation Result, Coded or Quantity
reports.query:
MATCH (n:CANONICAL_MODEL)-[r]->(m:CANONICAL_NODE)
-[v]->(q:CANONICAL_NODE)-[w]->(x:CANONICAL_NODE {name: 'RESULT'})-[t]->(o:CANONICAL_DATA_TYPE)-[u]->(p:CANONICAL_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY) 
RETURN n,r,m,v,q,w,x,t,o,p,u

MATCH (m:CANONICAL_NODE)-[r]->(n:CANONICAL_DATA_TYPE)-[s]->(o:CANONICAL_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY) 
RETURN m.name,n.data_type,o.name, o.uri

reports.title: Full Code Lists Loaded
reports.query: MATCH (cl:SKOS_CONCEPT)-[r1]->(cli:SKOS_CONCEPT) RETURN DISTINCT cl.identifier as C_Code, cl.notation as Submission, cl.pref_label as Preferred_Term

reports.title: BC Templates
reports.query:
MATCH (n:BC_TEMPLATE)
RETURN n.name as Name

reports.title: Detailed BC Template Graph
reports.query:
MATCH (m:BC_TEMPLATE)-[r]->(n:BC_ITEM)-[s]->(o:BC_DATA_TYPE)-[t]->(p:BC_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY), (o)-[u]->(q:FHIR_DATA_TYPE)
RETURN m,r,n,s,o,t,p,u,q

reports.title: BC Template Canonical References
reports.query:
MATCH (m:BC_TEMPLATE)-[r]->(n:BC_ITEM)-[s]->(o:BC_DATA_TYPE)-[t]->(p:BC_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY)-[u]->(q:CANONICAL_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY)
RETURN m,r,n,s,o,t,p,u,q

reports.title: BCs In System
reports.query: MATCH (n:BC_INSTANCE)-[:BASED_ON]->(t) RETURN n.name AS Name, t.name AS Template

reports.title: Detailed BC Instance Graph
reports.query:
MATCH (bc:BC_INSTANCE)-[r1:HAS_ITEM]->(i:BC_ITEM)
WITH bc,i,r1
OPTIONAL MATCH (i)-[r2:HAS_DATA_TYPE]->(dt:BC_DATA_TYPE)-[r3:HAS_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY]->(dp:BC_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY)
WITH bc,r1,i,r2,dt,r3,dp
OPTIONAL MATCH (dt)-[r4:HAS_RESPONSE]->(sc)
RETURN bc,r1,i,r2,dt,r3,dp,r4,sc

reports.title: SDTM Model
reports.query: MATCH (n:SDTM_MODEL)-[]->(m:SDTM_CLASS) RETURN n.name as Model, n.name as Class

reports.title: SDTM Model Graph
reports.query: MATCH (n:SDTM_MODEL)-[r1]->(m:SDTM_CLASS)-[r2]->(v:SDTM_MODEL_VARIABLE)-[r3]->(c:CANONICAL_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY) RETURN n,m,v,c,r1,r2,r3

reports.title: SDTM Domains
reports.query: MATCH (n:SDTM_DATASET) RETURN n.name as Name, n.description as Description

reports.title: SDTM IG Graph
reports.query: MATCH (n:SDTM_IG)-[r1]->(m:SDTM_DATASET) RETURN n,m,r1

reports.title: IG to Model & Canonical Links
reports.query:
MATCH (v1:SDTM_MODEL_VARIABLE)-[]->(c:CANONICAL_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY)
WITH v1,c
MATCH (v1)<-[]-(v2:SDTM_VARIABLE) 
RETURN v2.name as IG_Variable, v1.name as Model_Variable, c.name as Canonical

reports.title: Raw Data
reports.query: MATCH (n:STUDY_DATA_POINT)-[]->(m:STUDY_SUBJECT) RETURN n.value as Value, m.identifier as Subject_Id

reports.title: Study Data
reports.query:
MATCH (sd:SDTM_DATASET {name: 'VS'})-[]->(sv:SDTM_VARIABLE)-[]->(cv:SDTM_MODEL_VARIABLE)-[:IS_CANONICAL_REF]->(fdt:CANONICAL_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY)
  <-[:IS_CANONICAL_REF]-(bdt:BC_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY)<-[:FOR_VALUE]-(sdp:STUDY_DATA_POINT)-[]->(wfi:WORKFLOW_ITEM), 
  (wfi)-[:USED_IN_VISIT]->(v:VISIT), 
  (sdp)-[:FOR_SUBJECT]->(subj:STUDY_SUBJECT),
  (e:EPOCH)-[]->(v),
  (ct)<-[:HAS_RESPONSE]-()<-[:HAS_DATA_TYPE]-()<-[:HAS_IDENTIFIER]-(bc:STUDY_BC_INSTANCE)-[*]->(bdt)
RETURN subj.identifier as subject, wfi.id as key, sd.name as domain, sv.name as variable, ct.notation as test_code, sdp.value as data, v.name as visit, e.study_epoch_name as epoch

reports.title: Key Relationships I
reports.query:
MATCH (sd:SDTM_DATASET {name: 'VS'})-[r1]->(sv:SDTM_VARIABLE)-[r2]->(cv:SDTM_MODEL_VARIABLE)-[r3:IS_CANONICAL_REF]->(fdt:CANONICAL_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY)<-[r4:IS_CANONICAL_REF]-(bdt:BC_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY)
RETURN sd, sv, cv, fdt, bdt, r1,r2,r3,r4

reports.title: Key Relationships II
reports.query:
MATCH (sdp:STUDY_DATA_POINT)-[r6]->(wfi:WORKFLOW_ITEM), (wfi)-[r7:USED_IN_VISIT]->(v:VISIT), (sdp)-[r8:FOR_SUBJECT]->(subj:STUDY_SUBJECT)
RETURN sdp, wfi, v, subj, r6, r7,r8

reports.title: The Overall Graph
reports.query:
MATCH (sd:SDTM_DATASET {name: 'VS'})-[r1]->(sv:SDTM_VARIABLE)-[r2]->(cv:SDTM_MODEL_VARIABLE)-[r3:IS_CANONICAL_REF]->(fdt:CANONICAL_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY)<-[r4:IS_CANONICAL_REF]-(bdt:BC_DATA_TYPE_PROPERTY)<-[r5:FOR_VALUE]-(sdp:STUDY_DATA_POINT)-[r6]->(wfi:WORKFLOW_ITEM), (wfi)-[r7:USED_IN_VISIT]->(v:VISIT), (sdp)-[r8:FOR_SUBJECT]->(subj:STUDY_SUBJECT)
RETURN sd, sv, cv, fdt, bdt, sdp, wfi, v, subj, r1,r2,r3,r4,r5,r6,r7,r8
